mdRecord.dcterms:title: Eli Banana
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holsinger's Studio (Charlottesville, Va.) [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Top row: Charley Valentine, Johnny Davidson, Babe Lawson, Ben Balser, Bill Stephenson, George Martin, Bill Camp, Harrison Echols, Bub Newman, Staige Blackford, Bob Bullington, Al Kemper Middle row: Dave Wood, Paddy Balser, Johnny Staige Davis, "Sloey" Johnston, Willard Simon Seward, Russell Parrish, Irvin Acales, Sam Ward, Hippo Min, Bill Pettway Bottom row: Bob Harrison, Bill Mosely, Bob Hatcher, Bill Coupeland, Charlie Mahood, Dr. "Reddy" Echols, "Money" Boyd, "Orie" Proileau, Tom Gresham [?], "Cupid" Hendreu [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
